attributes.background:
https://www.instagram.com/juliemontagu/?hl=en
Julie Montagu has inspired many with her 62K followers on Instagram alone  and her three books. She has also featured on the popular TV show, 'Ladies of London'. She is a loving mother of four.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
